page.title: 16POPULATION
page.content: ONE QUARTER OF THE CHILDREN AT PRESENT ATTENDING" {HOLYOAKES FIELD FIRST {SCHOOL}"COME FROM FAMILIES WHOSE FIRST LANGUAGE IS URDU.SOME OF THE CHILDREN, AND THE MAJORITY OF THE PARENTS, WERE BORN IN PAKISTAN.MANY PEOPLE HAVE MOVED INTO THIS AREA TO TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THE NEW INDUSTRIES IN THE TOWN.IN ADDITION SOME PEOPLE COMMUTE TO BIRMINGHAM TO WORK.THE MAJORITY OF PEOPLE HAVE CARS,NEARLY EVERYBODY HAS A TELEVISION.IT IS QUITE COMMON FOR BOTH PARENTS TO WORK, ALTHOUGH UNEMPLOYMENT IS SLIGHTLY ABOVE THE NATIONAL AVERAGE.{SHOPPING}IS FAIRLY EASY SINCE THE {KINGFISHER SHOPPING {CENTRE }HAS BEEN BUILT.MOST SHOPPING CAN BE COMPLETED UNDER COVER AND AWAY FROM TRAFFIC.THERE ARE MANY CLUBS,AND PLACES OF ENTERTAINMENT.
